metadata.title: CVE-2024-39330 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Django 5.0 before 5.0.7 and 4.2 before 4.2.14.Derived classes of the django.core.files.storage.Storage base class, whenthey override generate_filename() without replicating the file-pathvalidations from the parent class, potentially allow directory traversalvia certain inputs during a save() call. (Built-in Storage sub-classes areunaffected.)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-39330` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.12').
